column4: Why is it that when I first log in to my account I get sound, but then when I suspend my computer, I get no sound?  My sound card is ATI Technologies Inc SBx00 Azalia (Intel HDA).
no sound plays when you suspend, by default.  assuming that's what you mean
or do you mean after you resume from a suspension?
